alert.note: Alert for Pershing (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 11 at 11:06AM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Nevada... Humboldt River Near Imlay affecting Pershing County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. For the Humboldt Basin...including Imlay...elevated river levels are forecast to continue. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Humboldt River Near Imlay. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.7 feet, Access to the Flying M Ranch is limited due to water over Old Idaho Stage Road. Flood waters up to a foot deep are possible on Tungsten Road, but the road may remain passable to high clearance, four-wheel drive vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:20 AM PDT Sunday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:20 AM PDT Sunday was 10.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.8 feet late this morning. - Action stage is 9.5 feet. - Flood stage is 10.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon.
